oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Chemical treatment of photoluminescent porous silicon
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: VADJIKAR, RM
JAIN, B
GUPTA, PK
NANDEDKAR, RV
BHAWALKAR, DD
PATNI, MJ

optical-properties
si
morphology

surfaces
films
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Porous silicon layers formed by electrochemical anodizing show photoluminescence in the visible region. We report on the effect of chemical treatments such as hydrofluoric acid dip, ammonium fluoride solution treatment and boiling water treatment on the photoluminescence of porous silicon. In view of our results the mechanism of photoluminescence of porous silicon is discussed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: MATERIALS SCIENCE AND ENGINEERING B-SOLID STATE MATERIALS FOR ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY,23(2)L13-L15
